author: cnbc.com
title: Matrix Medical Network announces the appointment of Heidi Cannon as Senior Vice President, Account Management
text:
SCOTTSDALE, Ariz., April 12, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Matrix Medical Network (Matrix), a leading population health provider of in-home and mobile health services, has announced that Heidi Cannon has joined the company as senior vice president, account management. In this role, Ms. Cannon will be responsible for the continued growth and development of the account management organization, emphasizing the company’s ability to drive better health outcomes for the members it serves.
Ms. Cannon comes to Matrix as a highly accomplished leader with strong executive healthcare experience across a variety of leadership roles. Most recently, Ms. Cannon served as the market president at Evolent Health, where she helped provider organizations achieve clinical and financial results in value-based care. Prior to that, Ms. Cannon served as vice president, account management for Matrix from 2010 to 2016, leading the development of major client relationships and helping to drive the company’s significant growth. In 2016, Ms. Cannon received the Matrix CEO Leadership award.
“We are delighted to have Heidi return to our team,” said Michael Ansel, Matrix chief growth officer. “Her outstanding leadership and deep healthcare experience will help us as we continue to expand the population health services we deliver in the home and via our mobile health clinics.”
Earlier in her career, Ms. Cannon also held leadership roles in marketing and account management for Healthways (now Tivity Health), and led regional operations and planning for the National Federation of Independent Business (NFIB).
Matrix’s services, available to nearly one in five Medicare Advantage members, have expanded to support Medicaid and ACA health plans and provider groups. Leveraging a network of more than 6,000 community-based providers across all 50 states, Matrix improves health outcomes while ensuring payment accuracy and alignment with care quality guidelines.
About Matrix Medical Network
Matrix Medical Network provides a broad array of assessment and care management services to individuals that improve health outcomes and health plan financial performance. Using advanced data capture and diagnostic technologies, Matrix providers visit with health plan members to gain a deep understanding about how to best support their care needs. This information is used to enhance their relationships with primary care providers and ensure that health plan services are appropriately aligned, resulting in better overall health outcomes. Matrix is headquartered in Scottsdale, AZ, and partners with leading health plans and providers across the country. Matrix is backed by Frazier Healthcare and Providence Service Corporation (Nasdaq:PRSC) of Stamford, CT. For more information, visit matrixmedicalnetwork.com .
